title: My Page
subtitle: View all your activities from sheet music purchases to custom orders at a glance.

profile.label: Profile Management
profile.description: Manage your personal information and contact details.

purchases.label: Purchase History
purchases.description: Check your purchased sheet music order information.

downloads.label: Download Management
downloads.description: Download and preview your purchased sheet music.

cash.label: Point History
cash.description: Check your point balance and usage history.

customOrders.label: Custom Orders
customOrders.description: Check the status of your custom order requests.

profile.title: Profile Management
profile.cashBalanceDescription: Available for your next sheet music purchase.
profile.name: Name

downloads.title: Download Management
downloads.description: You can re-download purchased sheet music anytime.

favorites.title: Favorite Sheets
favorites.description: Quickly find your favorite sheet music.

inquiries.title: 1:1 Inquiry
inquiries.description: Submit an inquiry and receive admin responses directly in My Page.
inquiries.name: Name
inquiries.subject: Subject
inquiries.messagePlaceholder: Please write your inquiry in detail (max 500 characters)

history.title: My Inquiry History
history.description: Check your submitted inquiries and admin responses.
history.noInquiriesDescription: If you have any questions, please submit an inquiry using the form above.
history.preparing: Response is being prepared. We will contact you after review.

cash.title: Point History
cash.description: Check your point balance and usage history.
cash.noHistoryDescription: Point transactions will be recorded here when you charge or use points.

customOrders.title: Custom Order History
customOrders.description: Check the status of your custom order requests.
customOrders.serviceDescription: Use our custom order service to create special sheet music.

cashCharge.title: Cash Charge
cashCharge.depositorNameHint: * If the depositor name differs from your member name, please enter the depositor name.

bankTransferNotice.title: Bank Transfer Notice
bankTransferNotice.line1: • Cash will be charged manually by admin after deposit confirmation.
bankTransferNotice.line2: • Confirmation may be delayed if depositor name does not match.
bankTransferNotice.line3: • Deposit confirmation may take 1-2 business days.

cashCharge.agreement: I have reviewed the payment details and agree to the terms.

guest.title: Login Required
guest.description: Please log in to use My Page features such as purchase history, downloads, and favorite sheets.

errors.agreementRequired: Please agree to the payment terms.
errors.amountNotFound: Selected charge amount could not be found.
errors.paymentMethodNotReady: This payment method is currently being prepared.
errors.paymentWindowOpen: Payment window will open. Please complete the payment.
errors.paymentError: An error occurred during payment processing.
errors.orderReceived: Order has been received.\nCash will be charged after deposit confirmation by admin.
errors.inquirySubmitted: Inquiry has been submitted. We will respond as soon as possible.
errors.inquiryError: An error occurred while sending the inquiry. Please try again.
errors.profileUpdateError: Failed to update profile. Please try again later.
errors.downloadRestricted: This order has been refunded or download is restricted.
errors.selectDownloadItems: Please select sheet music to download.
errors.downloadRestrictedMultiple: Refunded or restricted sheet music cannot be downloaded.
errors.loginRequiredForDownload: Login is required. Please log in again.
errors.downloadFailed: Failed to download {{count}} files. Please try again later.
errors.downloadFailedSingle: File download failed. Please try again later.
errors.sheetInfoNotFound: Downloadable sheet music information not found.
errors.downloadLinkNotFound: Download link not found. Please contact admin.
